title: Privacy protection federated learning system based on blockchain and edge computing in mobile crowdsourcing
summaries: in the conventional FL framework, __[1] enable task participants to delegate encrypted data (with DLD-LDP) to edge servers__ for local training __[2] employ multimodal transformer__ after the global model is trained, __[3] employ a blockchain as the platform__ to prevent malicious attacks
systemModel: __task publishers__: government, companies, and they initialize the global model
help task participants to download initial model
help task participants to submit local models
leader miner node aggregates the global model
__edge server__: high computing power and data processing power, (1) help users to process data
__task participants__: upload multi-modal local data, which is protected by DLD-LDP, to edge servers to train the local model
the task publisher defines the released task as the initialization model<ol>
the task publisher publishes it through the blockchain
task participants perturb local data with DLD-LDP and send to respective edge server for training
edge servers perform local training and upload to the blockchain
the leader miner in the blockchain aggregate local models
after the model is finally trained, the platform uses the MulT algorithm to process to get multi-modal information
